name: Baezult (itch)
description:
Baezult is a puzzle/action platformer set in a lost temple hidden for thousands of years behind a waterfall. You play as a brave explorer looking to find riches beyond his wildest dreams. But be careful, the people of the temple have protected their wealth very well.

Baezult is a free game that is currently out now, it has many fantastic puzzles and a large number of secrets for you to find.

If you want to support this game please go to this http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=346542428 Steam Greenlight page and vote yes on it, if it gets on steam it will still be free.
